name: Escape Lite
description:
Addicting gameplay and challenging puzzles make Escape a great game that will keep you occupied for countless hours. Use bombs, collect keys, pick locks, dodge shooters, push blocks,teleport around, and much more to escape from each puzzle. Make sure to keep an eye out for hidden passageways and other secrets, each level is designed to require creativity and innovative thinking.

"It has very addicting gameplay and will keep you occupied for countless hours. The sounds and music that accompany the game guarantee excitement with every passing level" - planet-iphones.com

"Overall this is a fun game with a lot of really creative puzzles" - iphoneappreviews.net

"It keeps you thinking and trying to solve each level, there is a wide array of different puzzle elements to play with, and difficulty progression is well handled." - Touchpodium.com


Make sure to check out Nuclear Nova's golf game simulator, GL Golf and GL Golf Lite. GL Golf is a 3D golfing game for the casual gamer. With a realistic physics system and great simple graphics, you and up to four players can golf twenty+ unique courses for countless hours. Also make sure to check out Nuclear Nova's new golf game, Rocket Golf and Rocket Golf Lite. Rocket Golf gives golfing a new twist with its 2D gameplay and clean 3D graphics. Challenge yourself to 36 unique holes over two courses. Rocket Golf provides accurate game physics while maintaining an arcade feel.
